headline: L3Harris Sets Date for Fourth Quarter 2024 Earnings Release
summary: MELBOURNE, Fla., January 06, 2025--L3Harris Technologies (NYSE: LHX) will release its fourth quarter 2024 financial results before market opens on Thursday, Jan. 30, 2025.

raw.headline: L3Harris Sets Date for Fourth Quarter 2024 Earnings Release
raw.summary: MELBOURNE, Fla., January 06, 2025--L3Harris Technologies (NYSE: LHX) will release its fourth quarter 2024 financial results before market opens on Thursday, Jan. 30, 2025.

headline: L3Harris Completes Sale of Specialized Materials Business to BWXT for Approximately $100 Million
summary: MELBOURNE, Fla., January 06, 2025--L3Harris Technologies (NYSE: LHX) has completed the sale of its specialized materials business, Aerojet Ordnance Tennessee, Inc. (A.O.T.), to BWX Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: BWXT) for approximately $100 million.

raw.headline: L3Harris Completes Sale of Specialized Materials Business to BWXT for Approximately $100 Million
